channel.title: Tables and execution order
channel.description:
Hi all,
I was wondering about whether it matters where a table is in your patch in terms of execution order?
If you are writing/reading a lot of data to/from tables does where the table is make a difference?
I've always assumed it doesn't matter, but wanted to be sure?

item.title: Tables and execution order
item.dc:creator: @reubenfinger
item.description:
@reubenfinger wrote:

Hey Matt hope you're well,

I have always placed tables top left, but am unsure where I gleaned that from, so am curious too what the more learned members have to say...

Read full topic
